title: Top Class: The Life and Times of the Sierra Canyon Trailblazers
overview: Top Class follows a new mecca of high school athletics, nestled just outside of Los Angeles. The back-to-back state champion Sierra Canyon Trailblazers exploded onto basketball's national stage with one of the highest profile classes in history, including some of the nation's highest-ranking players - BJ Boston, Amari Bailey, Bronny James, Shy Odom, Zaire Wade, and Ziaire Williams.
